item.title: Yotta Free
item.description:
Yotta Free is a Mac app for making users look drunk. Using both this app and a video conferencing app, you can enjoy online drinking parties without alcohol.
Yotta Free changes your face and voice to look drunk in realtime. This app is technically based on face segmentation (ECCV 2018) and vocoder. This app developed in a one-day hackathon HackDay 2021.

item.title: Insticker
item.description: Insticker is a system for instantly generating a sticker from a target word and your emotion. This system works with a laptop PC and a cutting plotter. Insticker project is in a one-day hackathon HackDay 2019.
